channel.title: Theology on Im Jeremy
channel.description: Recent content in Theology on Im Jeremy

item.title: Why I believe in a God
item.description: Published by jeremy on December 26, 2021 Wow, big question right ? My understanding has changed progressively over the years and evolved in many ways. There several reasons as to why I believe in a God. In no particular order, here are my reasons: Jesus Christ, a real person who walked this Earth and claimed to be God. The evidence that shows he existed, died and resurrected is very convincing
